@graph.name: Calorie Calculator - Calculate Your Daily Calorie Needs | CalorieTest

audience.audienceType: Health-conscious individuals, fitness enthusiasts, nutritionists, healthcare professionals

about.name: Weight Loss
about.description: Evidence-based calorie deficit calculations for sustainable weight loss using scientifically validated formulas including BMR, TDEE, and metabolic rate assessments. Provides personalized weight loss planning with safe, realistic timeline projections.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Medical condition addressed through precise calorie deficit planning using validated metabolic equations, distinguished from fad diets by scientific accuracy and sustainability focus.

about.name: Daily Calorie Needs
about.description: Precise BMR and TDEE calculations for optimal daily caloric intake based on age, gender, height, weight, and activity level. Uses Mifflin-St Jeor equation and Harris-Benedict formula for accurate energy expenditure assessment.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Scientifically calculated daily energy requirements that differ from generic calorie recommendations by incorporating individual metabolic factors and activity patterns.

about.name: Calorie Burn Calculator
about.description: Activity-based calorie expenditure tracking and exercise planning tools. Calculate calories burned during cardio, strength training, sports, and daily activities with MET (Metabolic Equivalent) values for accurate fitness planning.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Exercise-specific calorie calculation tool that provides precise energy expenditure data based on activity type, intensity, and duration, distinct from generic fitness trackers.

about.name: BMI Calculator
about.description: Body Mass Index assessment with health recommendations using WHO and CDC guidelines. Includes weight category classification (underweight, normal, overweight, obese) with associated health risk assessments and improvement suggestions.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Medical screening tool that calculates BMI according to international health standards, providing clinical-grade assessments beyond simple weight categorization.

about.name: Calorie Counting
about.description: Comprehensive calorie tracking tools and nutritional analysis for weight management, muscle gain, and health optimization. Includes macronutrient breakdown, portion control guidance, and meal planning recommendations.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Systematic approach to nutrition monitoring that provides detailed caloric and macronutrient analysis, distinguished from basic food logging by scientific precision.

about.name: Weight Management Tools
about.description: Professional-grade calculators for fitness and nutrition professionals including BMR, TDEE, body fat percentage, and weight loss projection tools. Scientifically validated formulas used by dietitians, personal trainers, and healthcare providers.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Professional-grade calculation suite that provides clinical-accuracy results using validated scientific formulas, distinct from consumer fitness apps.

about.name: Calorie
about.description: A unit of energy measurement used to quantify the energy content in food and the energy expenditure during physical activities. Essential for weight management and metabolic calculations.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Scientific unit of energy measurement specifically used in nutrition contexts, distinct from physics calories by scale (kilocalories vs calories).

about.name: Basal Metabolic Rate
about.description: The minimum number of calories your body needs to maintain basic physiological functions at rest, including breathing, circulation, cell production, and organ function. Calculated using scientifically validated formulas.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Precise measurement of resting metabolic demands, calculated under standardized conditions and distinct from general daily calorie needs.

about.name: Total Daily Energy Expenditure
about.description: The comprehensive calculation of all calories burned in a 24-hour period, including basal metabolic rate, thermic effect of food, exercise activity thermogenesis, and non-exercise activity thermogenesis. Critical for accurate weight management planning.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Complete 24-hour energy expenditure calculation that accounts for all metabolic components, providing more accurate weight management guidance than BMR alone.

about.name: Mifflin-St Jeor Equation
about.description: The most accurate and widely accepted scientific formula for calculating resting energy expenditure, developed in 1990. More precise than the Harris-Benedict equation, accounting for modern lifestyle factors and body composition variations.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Gold-standard metabolic calculation formula that superseded earlier equations through improved accuracy for diverse populations and modern lifestyles.

image.caption: Mifflin-St Jeor equation formula diagram
image.description: Visual representation of the Mifflin-St Jeor equation used for calculating BMR

about.name: Weight Management
about.description: The systematic approach to achieving and maintaining a healthy body weight through balanced caloric intake and expenditure. Includes weight loss, weight gain, and weight maintenance strategies based on individual metabolic needs.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Evidence-based approach to body weight regulation that emphasizes sustainable lifestyle changes over temporary dietary restrictions.

about.name: Body Mass Index
about.description: A screening tool that measures body fat based on height and weight ratios. Used by healthcare professionals to assess weight categories and potential health risks associated with underweight, normal weight, overweight, and obesity classifications.
about.disambiguatingDescription: Standardized anthropometric assessment tool used globally for population health screening, though limited for individual body composition analysis.

featureList: BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) calculation using Mifflin-St Jeor equation
Multiple activity level options (sedentary to very active)
Weight loss and weight gain calorie recommendations
Target date and weight change rate planning

isBasedOn.name: A new predictive equation for resting energy expenditure in healthy individuals
isBasedOn.headline: A new predictive equation for resting energy expenditure in healthy individuals
isBasedOn.abstract: Foundational research establishing the most accurate equation for calculating resting metabolic rate, improving upon previous formulas through comprehensive study of diverse populations.

image.caption: Research article preview image
image.description: Preview image of the foundational research article on resting energy expenditure

review.reviewBody: Very accurate calculator that helped me understand my daily calorie needs for weight loss. Easy to use interface with detailed explanations.
Great tool for meal planning. The macronutrient breakdown is especially helpful for my fitness goals.

@graph.releaseNotes: Enhanced accuracy with updated activity multipliers and improved mobile interface

author.name: Ihsanullah Sadiq
author.description: Software engineer and First-Class Computer Science graduate from Queen Mary University of London, specializing in health technology solutions. Expert in developing scientifically-accurate fitness and nutrition calculation tools.
author.disambiguatingDescription: Lead developer and health technology specialist with First-Class Honours degree from Queen Mary University of London, responsible for creating and maintaining CalorieTest's suite of evidence-based nutrition calculators.
